name: decadent feathers invitation UNASSEMBLED
description: this invite is decadent! metallic layers of gold and bronze with a silky satin ribbon and real peacock feather set the tone for a truly luxe event. minimum order of 50. these invites come printed and ready for you to assemble! each invite set includes: -printed invite panel -pre cut bronze backing layer -printed rsvp postcard and additional insert OR printed rsvp and envelope -outer envelope in peacock blue or natural -satin ribbon -peacock feather you will also receive one fully assembled invite as reference for assembly. __________________________________ you will be contacted after your order is placed for the wording for your invite panel and any inserts. please order the total number of invitations you need (don't forget extras!). be sure to select your envelope color! if you want the rsvp with envelope option, the envelope color selected will be the same for both outer and rsvp envelope. please allow 4-6 weeks for processing, proofing and printing. ______________________________________ { tip } do you want to print them yourself too? check out our latest addition: DIY peacock kit! if you are interested in printed and fully assembled invitations, please contact us using the form on this site to check availability.

name: peacock save the date
description:
let your guests know about your special day and set the tone for your luxe peacock event! postcards are less expensive to mail, so these will save you money in postage!

if postcards are not for you, no worries. you can add envelopes and even a magnet backing! 

please allow 4 weeks for processing and production. timing may vary based on availability. 

minimum order of 50.

choose product option below. you will be contacted for your wording after order is received.

***layered cards do not include assembly***

name: DIY imprintable peacock invitation { set of 25 }
description: it's here! now you can make your own decadent feathers invitation! this package includes everything you need to make a gorgeous invitation just like the original! you just need to print and assemble! 25 backing layers 25 print layers 25 outer envelopes 25 response postcards 25 feathers 25 satin ribbons assembly instructions, printing tips and one assembled invite (per order) to inspire you! everything is already cut to size...just set up your wording how you want using your favorite program and print on the gorgeous metallic top layer and rsvp card... assemble and wa-la! please allow 3-4 weeks for order processing before shipping. _________________________________ order the number of boxes you need and be sure to select your envelope color! (peacock blue shown) please note: printable layers are 105# coated metallic finish card stock which is compatible in most LASER printers. adhesives are not included. double sided tape is recommended. please keep this in mind when ordering.

name: layered panel peacock invite
description: this invite is decadent! a gorgeous feather printed on luxe gold metallic and backed with bronze metallic is sure to set the tone for an elegant soiree. sold unassembled. minimum order of 50. these invites come printed and ready for you to assemble! each ensemble includes: -printed invite panel -pre cut bronze backing layer -printed rsvp postcard -outer envelope in peacock blue or natural (please specify below) if you need additional inserts or rsvp envelopes, please purchase those separately in the shop. __________________________________ you will be contacted after your order is placed for the wording for your invite panel and any inserts. please order the total number of invitations you need (don't forget extras!). be sure to select your envelope color! please allow 4-6 weeks for processing, proofing and printing. ______________________________________ { tip } if you are interested in printed AND fully assembled invitations, please contact us using the form on this site to check availability.

name: wrap address labels
description:
these are such a fun and modern way to address your envelopes! these adhesive backed metallic labels are printed with your return and guest addresses, and they coordinate perfectly with the decadent peacock invitations! 

have a custom invitation design but still have to have these? no problem. these can be customized to match your design!

just order the number you need and be sure to order extra for unexpected add-on guests! minimum order of 48. must be ordered in multiples of 4 as there are 4/sheet.

you will be contacted after your order is placed for your addresses. an excel file will be sent to you to fill in with the addresses.

name: add insert
description:
are you having another event as part of your wedding or just have some extra details to share with your guests? no problem! just add an extra insert! 

order the number of inserts you need (minimum of 50) to match your invitation order. 

need more than just one extra insert? just place an order for each insert you need! 

you will be contacted for your wording after your order is received.

inserts are printed paper that coordinates with the invitations you ordered.

name: peacock place cards
description:
complete the look for your event with these shimmering peacock place cards! these come printed with your guests names / table numbers and peacock feather graphic. 

keep the look going throughout your eventâ€”ask us about other coordinating items like menus, programs, seating charts and more!

minimum order of 50.

you will be contacted after your order is received for your guest list.

name: deposit for custom invitation design
description:
contact us using the form in the contact section about your design needs and then use this product to make your deposit for a custom invitation design!

we will need to know what quantity, theme, colors etc you need as well as your timing and budget to get started. note that custom designs have a minimum quantity of 50.

name: holiday cards { 8 pack }
description:
these are super fun! made with french pop-tones paper colors, and fun patterned paper from american crafts, they are the perfect blend of modern and traditional holiday! there are four colors, two die cut shapes and 60 patterns...so each pack is bound to be unique! and cards are blank inside for your own unique message!

sold in packs of eight snowflakes OR eight trees. select option below
includes 6" square white envelopes*. 

and don't forget our coordinating tree gift tags! also sold in packs of eight. 

{ note } patterns are random and will vary per pack, however each pack will contain two of each of the four card colors shown.

*extra postage required.

name: holiday gift tags { 8 pack }
description:
these are super fun and use recycled scraps! made with french pop-tones paper colors, and patterned paper from american crafts they are the perfect blend of modern and traditional holiday!

the trees are made from the die cut tree shapes punched out of our coordinating cards, and layered over paper swatches in 60 different patterns...so each pack is bound to be unique! they are finished with a red or green skinny satin ribbons for attaching to gifts!

sold in packs of eight.

patterns are random and will vary per pack. each pack will contain two of each of the four tree colors shown. trees are pop mounted, so they are raised slightly above the paper. each tag has a coordinating solid color on the back, ready for your own unique message.

name: decadent peacock thank you cards
description:
a decadent way to thank your guests! these coordinate perfectly with the decadent peacock ensemble and are the perfect finishing touch for a really pulled together look.

printed on gold metallic card stock with coordinating gold envelope.

minimum order of 50 required.
